constraints.name: subarray_cost
constraints.description: 子数组的代价定义为子数组中任意两个不同元素的按位或操作结果的最小值
constraints.formal: cost(a[l:r]) = min(a_i | a_j) for all i, j in [l, r] and i != j

constraints.name: query_range
constraints.description: 每个查询指定一个子数组范围，要求计算该子数组的代价
constraints.formal: for each query (l, r), compute cost(a[l:r]) where 1 <= l < r <= n
